title: Diagram dependance of the $\mathbb{CP}(1)$ beta function
abstract:
We revisit the computation of the beta function in the two-dimensional
$\mathbb{CP}(1)$ sigma model. We show that in different schemes, different
diagrams are responsible for the running, such as momentum-independent tadpoles
or even UV-finite bubble diagrams. We also comment on the relation between the
beta functions and the energy dependence of scattering amplitudes.
